attributes.action: Provide Cheaper Housing For The Younger Generation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a serious lack of cheaper housing making it hard for the "working" person to be able to afford without having to take out a morgage that we cannot afford

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide Cheaper Housing For The Younger Generation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12062.asp

Prime Minister's Office
